short_summary: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc4107478517 dated July 19th, 2023 with a closing of August 4th, 2023 at 11h00
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada is establishing Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSO) for use by all departments (notably DND and RCMP) in British Columbia and Yukon Territory. The location of the work will be in the Okanagan, Lower Mainland, Nanaimo and Northern BC areas. PSPC intends to award up to one more RMSO for the Fraser Valley/Lower Mainland area, up to two RMSOs for the Okanagan areas, up to one RMSO for the Nanaimo Regional District and up to one RMSO per city for Northern BC. RMSOs will be for period of 1 year with 1 additional option year. Services will include the delivery and supply of hot and cold meals, both dispersed and served cafeteria style.
full_summary:
# EZ156-230001: Catering Services Request for Standing Offer

## Notice Details
* **Reference Number:** WS4107322252
* **Notice Date:** August 11, 2023
* **Closing Date:** 2:00 PM (Local Time), September 1, 2023
* **Amendment Date:** August 15, 2023
* **Contract Dates:** August 17, 2023 to August 10, 2024

## Solicitation Overview
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites Canadian and/or International bidders/offerors/suppliers to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) process to establish Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSO) for catering services. The RMSO will be used by various government departments, including the Department of National Defence (DND) and the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), in British Columbia and Yukon.

## Scope of Work
The RMSO will provide catered meals for government employees stationed in various locations in British Columbia and the Yukon. The meals will be hot and cold, served cafeteria-style, and available for delivery and pick-up. The services will be provided from August 17, 2023, to August 10, 2024, with an option to extend for one additional year.

## Tender Requirements
PSPC will select the successful suppliers based on the lowest price offered. The selection criteria are:

*   Lowest Price (LP)

## Trade Agreements
The RFSO is open to Canadian and/or International bidders/offerors/suppliers that meet the selection criteria.

## Region Information
The contract work locations will be:

*   Okanagan Region
*   Lower Mainland Region
*   Nanaimo Regional District
*   Northern BC (select cities)

## Contact Information
For questions or clarification on this solicitation, please contact:

*   Thomas Leboeuf, SPAC/PSPC, at (il-lui/he-him)
*   [thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca] (mailto:thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Additional Information
This solicitation replaces the previous bid solicitation, Doc4107478517, dated July 19, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided to bidders/offerors/suppliers who participated in the previous solicitation.

 **
